body:
Hi Silvia,


the viewpoitfile must have the same format as a viewpoint file for 
rpict or rvu (*.vf). Multiple lines correspond to multiple calculation 
points.
Hope that helps, if not, is there any error message?


good luck,
Jan


Am 2013-10-23 18:01, schrieb Cammarano Silvia:
